d.description: Define core types: LayoutDirection (Row/Column), LayoutAlign (Start/Center/End/SpaceBetween), SizingMode (Fixed/Fill/Hug). Consider how these compose and what defaults make sense. Document edge cases.
d.title: Design autolayout data model

d.description: Implement LayoutDirection, MainAxisAlign, CrossAxisAlign, SizingMode enums. Add Layout struct with direction, main_align, cross_align, gap, padding fields. Add Constraints struct for child sizing behavior.
d.title: Add layout types to node_2

d.description: Extend Shape to hold optional Layout for frames. Add per-shape Constraints for how shape behaves in parent layout. Ensure non-frame shapes ignore layout fields gracefully.
d.title: Add layout properties to Frame shapes

d.description: Create layout computation that positions children based on parent Layout settings. Handle: 1) measuring children (hug vs fixed), 2) distributing space (fill children), 3) alignment on both axes, 4) gap between items, 5) padding inset. Engine should be pure function: (parent_bounds, layout, children) -> positioned_children.
d.title: Implement layout engine

d.description: Call layout engine during render/update to reposition children of frames with layout enabled. Ensure manual repositioning is blocked for auto-laid-out children. Handle nested layouts (child frames with their own layout).
d.title: Integrate layout engine into canvas_2

d.description: Add commands: SetLayout (direction, alignment, gap, padding), SetConstraints (sizing mode per axis), EnableLayout/DisableLayout. Ensure commands validate (e.g., can't set layout on non-frame).
d.title: API commands for layout properties

d.description: Add UI section for frames showing: layout toggle, direction picker, alignment controls, gap/padding inputs. Show child constraints when selecting a shape inside a layout frame. Disable position inputs for auto-laid-out children.
d.title: Layout editing in properties panel

d.description: Extend interchange format to serialize Layout and Constraints. Nested frames with layout should round-trip correctly. Consider backwards compatibility with files without layout data.
d.title: KDL serialization for layout

d.description: Render visual guides when editing layout: show gap spacing, padding bounds, alignment lines. Help users understand how layout is affecting children. Only show when frame is selected.
d.title: Layout visual guides

d.description: Add subcommands to luna CLI: 'layout enable/disable', 'layout direction row/column', 'layout gap <value>', 'layout padding <values>', 'layout align <main> <cross>'. Follow existing pattern of shapes/selection/count commands.
d.title: CLI convenience commands for layout

d.description: Add queries: GetLayout (returns layout config for target), GetChildSizing (returns sizing modes). Extend GetShapes to include layout fields in response.
d.title: Query API for layout state
